Yusuf Grillo (1934 - 23 Ọgọstụ 2021) bụ onye na-ese ihe n'oge a na Naijiria nke a maara maka ọrụ ya na-emepụta ihe na ngosiputa nke agba na-acha anụnụ anụnụ n'ọtụtụ ihe osise ya. Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Society of Nigerian Artists
A mụrụ Yusuf Grillo na Lagos

A na-ewere Grillo dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe na-ahụ mere nke ọma na agụmakwụkwọ na Naịjirịa; ọ pụtara bụrụ onye a ma ama na mmata mba ụwa na 1960s na 1970s, mgbe ọ na-egosipụta nnukwu nchịkọta nke ọrụ mbụ ya
Ọ na-eji ọzụzụ nka ọdịda anyanwụ ya n'ọtụtụ eserese ya, na-ejikọta usoro nka ọdịda anyanwụ na njirimara ihe ọkpụkpụ Yoruba
Mmasị ya maka agba na-acha anụnụ anụnụ na eserese ọdịdị, mgbe ụfọdụ ọ na-adị ka adire ma ọ bụ resist-dye textiles eji na Nigeria
O nwere oge ọ bụ onye isi nke ngalaba nka na mbipụta na Yaba College of Technology.
Ọ nwụrụ site na nsogbu sitere n'ọria nke COVID-19 na 23 Ọgọstụ 2021.
1983–1999 - Drummers Return nke a na-egosi ugbu a na Yemisi Shyllon Museum of Art
